biotools.summary:
Ordering gene-expression and functional events in single-cell experiments.

Data-driven Network Biology Group.

The goal of GeneSwitches is to discover the order of gene-expression and functional events during cell state transitions at a single-cell resolution. It works on any single-cell trajectory or pseudo-time ordering of cells to discover the genes that act as on/off switches between cell states and importantly the ordering at which these switches take place.
